mapper.select: SELECT b.uid, b.name, b.description, b.categories, b.scenes, a.create_time AS favorite_time FROM llm_app_favorite a LEFT JOIN llm_app_market b ON a.app_uid = b.uid WHERE a.user = #{userId} AND a.deleted = 0 AND b.audit = 1 AND b.deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC;

SELECT b.uid, b.name, b.model, b.version, b.language, b.tags, b.category, b.scenes, b.images, b.icon, b.free, b.cost, b.like_count, b.view_count, b.download_count, b.config, b.create_time, b.example, b.create_time, a.create_time AS favorite_time FROM llm_app_favorite a LEFT JOIN llm_app_market b ON a.app_uid = b.uid WHERE a.user = #{userId} AND a.app_uid = #{appUid} AND a.deleted = 0 AND b.audit = 1 AND b.deleted = 0 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT 1;
